titleStmt.title: A commemoration of the most prosperous and peaceable raigne of our gratious and deere soueraigne lady Elizabeth by the grace of God of England, Fraunce and Irelande, Queene &c. Now newly set foorth this. xvii. day of Nouember, beyng the first day of the. xviii. yeere of her Maiesties sayd raigne. By Edw. Hake. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Hake, Edward, fl. 1560-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: By William How, for Richard Iohnes, dwellynge without Newgate, ouer agaynst S. Sepulchers Churche,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Newgate, ouer agaynst S. Sepulchers Churche
